name: IT+ROBOTICS
goal:
T+Robotics is a spin-off company of the University of Padua. It was created in 2005, since then its role in industrial automation is growing day by day.
IT + Robotics is a young and dynamic company that designs quality control systems, robotic robot software and software for off-line programming of work cells and machines.
From 2009 IT+Robotics developed two products Smart Pick 3D and Smart Check 3D.
The first is the robot guidance solution for random bin picking. Thanks to the use of an advanced vision system, Smart Pick 3D allows a robot manipulator to collect objects randomly arranged within a container or moving on a conveyor belt. The use of vision systems allows numerous benefits to be obtained with respect to conventional automation systems. Flexibility and robustness are the main characteristics of the software.
euInitiatives: IT+Robotics performs different reasearch activities. Part of these activities are financed with internal funds and part by the EU. At the present time, IT+Robotics has 4 active European Projects in different calls: Echord++, Clean Sky and Horizon 2020. In the past years, other 3 European Projects have successfully been completed. The research activity ranges in different fields: robot trajectory simulation, coverage planner problem, quality inspection, 3D reconstruction, random bin-picking problem. The results of these research activities are then used for the improvement of existing products or for the launch of new ones.
